text: Brian Charles John Sedgemore (17 March 1937 â€“ 5 May 2015) was a Labour Party politician. He was a Member of Parliament from 1974 until 1979, and from 1983 until 2005. He defected to the Liberal Democrats shortly before he stood down at the 2005 general election. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Brian Sedgemore
